summary:
## Grammy Awards

The Grammy Awards, or "Grammys," are like the Oscars for music. They're given by the Recording Academy to musicians who have done something amazing. The award looks like a golden gramophone. Grammys are one of the biggest deals in entertainment, along with the Oscars, Emmys, and Tonys. The first Grammys were given out in 1959. There are now over 90 different categories.
title: Grammy Awards
